title: Ticket #3338: sentence grammar in manual section 3.2.6
description:
From bt:

In section 3.2.6 under RPMs I found the following line in the manual for 7.9:

Here are an ordered set of steps that get Condor running using the RPM.

I suggest the second word be changed from are to is.
check_ins: 2013-Mar-07 12:19   Check-in [35096]: Use correction of a typo to update links, ht-ify, and update versions for RPMs and Debian packages. Also make note that RHEL 5 needs virtualization channel explicitly enabled. ===GT=== #3497 ===GT=== #3338 (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
